meta.title: Bytedance
meta.description: PICO 2022 Chinese New Year Motion Design

contents.description: The animation is inspired by my anxiety about environmental pollution, plastic products and chemical waste are rapidly occupying the world, I tried to present this false beauty in the short film, and hope everyone can take care of the environment.

contents.content: 整个动画制作过程中，尝试了多种类型的动力学模拟，包括刚体、柔体、布料模拟等等。
